author: snoopdave
msg: Adds the missing Comments[n] link back to the entry edit page so that you can manage the comments associated for each entry.

author: jonesde
msg: Changed show shipment to handle multiple inventory reservation records for a given item and to actually use the quantity passed in the message (which was being ignored), also some refactoring and more validation checks and improved (hopefully) error handling

author: jmsnell
msg: Patch provided by Dan Diephouse in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ABDERA-55
Makes it easier to configure AbderaServlet using Spring.

msg: changed distribution basedir to separate from Apache2.
